job: Ingénieur en Développement FPGA et Traitement du signal

desc: Developing complex systems in VHDL language (hardware description language) to implement it on FPGA. I have improved my skills in:
• Research on reconfiguration design flow to create partitions that can be reconfigurable without editing the static part of the design (DPR). More information: UG909 Vivado
• Function development and simulation to deal with samples
• Testbench development in co-simulation to open hardware on Ethernet module
• Design of a 32-bit RISC processor in VHDL
